posts.post_title: Wanted to buy: Old Judge portrait cards
posts.post_content:
Looking for Old Judge portraits that I do not have - prefer strong image over technical grade. Please PM me if you have any available for sale or trade.

Thanks

Chris
Chris--if this is one you want please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]
